oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Avy Awards Report-1st U.S. Breeding Nominations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson, Dale R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The following U.S. First Breeding Nominations have been submitted co the AVY AWARDS COMMITIEE in 1982. We are asking your assistance for confirmacions on these nominations. Any information, whether verbal or in any printed literature, on previously recorded breedings on any of the species nominated are welcome. Please submit to Dale Thompson, AVY AWARDS CHAIRMAN, P.O. Box 1568, Redondo Beach, CA 90278.U.S. FIRST BREEDING NOMINATIONS - 19821. Lear's Macaw, Anodorhynchus lean· - June 28, 19822. Buffon's Macaw,Ara a. ambigua - June 19, 19823. Grand Cayman Amazon,Amazona leucocepbaia caymanensis - 19744. Yellow-shouldered Amazon, Amazona barbadensis barbadensis -June 9. 1982) . Yellow-shouldered Amazon, Amazona barbadensis rothschildi -June 16, 19826. Parvipes Yellow-naped Amazon, Amazona ochrocephala parvipes - May 8, 19827. White-capped Pionus,Pionus semlis - March 19, 19818. Painted Conure, Pyrrhura picta picta - August 10, 19829. Hoffman's Conure, Pyrrhura hoffmanni guadens - March 29, 198210. Red-throated Conure ,Aratinga ho/och/ora rubritorquis - July 30, 198211. Andean Paragonian Conure, Cyano/iseus patagonus andinus - July 22, 198212. Pacific Parrotlet,Forpus coelestis coelestis - May 25, 198213. Yellow-faced Parrotler,Forpus xantbops - March 17, 198214. Green-rumped Parrotlet,Forpus p. passerinos - Feb. 8, 198215. Spectacled Parrodet,Forpus conspiciliatus meta - Fourth week in Sept. 198116. Ducorp's Cockatoo,Cacatua ducorps - March 2, 198217. Black belly Fire Finch, Lagonosticta rara - July 4, 198118. Blue-billed Fire Finch, Lagonosticta rubricata - Sept. 23, 198019. Dybowski Twinspor,Eucbistospiza dybowskii or Clytospiza dybowskii (Taxinomical references) - Dec. 15, 198020. Yellow-winged Pytilia, Pytilia hypogrammica - June 5, 1980 •
